column1: Building Information Modelling Management and Integrated Digital Delivery MSc/PGDip/PGCert
column5: The construction sector is a major part of the UK economy and any centrally procured project will require Business Information Modelling (BIM) compliance. Yet there is a shortage of well qualified graduates who are capable of the efficient coordination of processes, workflows, people, assets and technology that BIM requires. This Masters degree was designed to meet that demand.
column7: UK students  MSc Full-time students: £8,900 Part-time per taught credit: £59 Part-time per dissertation credit: £30  PGDip Full-time students: £7,100 Per taught credit: £59  PGCert Full-time students: £3,550 Per taught credit: £59
